original_text: For thy violence against thy brother Jacob shame shall cover thee, and thou shalt be cut off for ever.
korean_text: 네가 네 형제 야곱에게 행한 포학으로 말미암아 부끄러움을 당하고 영원히 멸절되리라

sentences.original_text: For thy violence against thy brother Jacob
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 형제 야곱에게 행한 폭력 때문에

sentences.original_text: and thou shalt be cut off for ever
